projects.name: Event-Buddy
projects.desc: Event Buddy is a full-stack web application for event management. It provides a user-friendly interface for event registration and keeping track of upcoming activities.

projects.name: Survival Game
projects.desc: A 2D top-down survival game where enemies learn from your playstyle using Q-learning. Experience dynamic combat that evolves as you play.

projects.name: DriveX
projects.desc: DriveX is a dynamic and user-friendly platform designed to streamline ride booking and payment processes, offering seamless interaction for users. It integrates real-time car availability, dynamic pricing, and multiple payment methods to enhance the customer experience.
